page.title: 04FARMING IN HAMBLEDON
page.content: {RUSHMERE FARM HAMBLEDON 344 Acres. Age of farm: 600+yrs. {Farm buildings:}storage of grain, peas, straw, rape, machinery,fertilizer. {Type of farming:}arable. {Owners:} Mr. Crossley and Son. {Permanent employees:}2. Casual labour at harvest time.{No. of hrs worked per {day:}between 5-ll.{Holidays:}taken abroad in winter mths.{Livestock:} house 30 beef cattle winter.{Acreage {under arable:}3l0.{Main crop:}wheat {Other crops:}barley, peas, rape {Machinery:}l combine harvester, l drill, 4 tractors,1 plough, 5 cultivators, l fertilizer spreader, l muck spreader, l sprayer, l baler, l hedgecutter, l grain dryer and l trailer.{Main problems:}(1) fluctuating market prices (2) rising costs (3)weather.
